calculator_description: Amount, origin/destination currency (PEN, USD, BRL), rate and commission.
send_money_to_brazil_peru: Send money to Brazil and Peru with the best rates.
safe_fast_transparent: Safe, fast, and transparent transfers. No hidden fees, just great service for your loved ones.
chat_initial_message_2: I'm the Brasper bot. How can I help you today?
landing_title: Send money quickly and safely to Brazil and Peru
landing_description: Simulate in seconds how much your recipient receives, with competitive rates, multilingual support, and full transparency from step one.
landing_feature_1_description: Check the exchange rate and complete your transfer without long or confusing flows.
landing_feature_2_description: Before confirming, you always see fees, rate applied, and exact final amount received.
landing_feature_3_description: We apply security best practices to protect your account and each transfer.
landing_feature_4_description: Our team supports you via WhatsApp and digital channels to solve questions in real time.
landing_step_1_description: Register with your basic data and validate your profile in a few steps.
landing_step_2_description: Enter amount and currency to instantly preview the final conversion.
landing_step_3_description: Complete payment and follow transfer status from your dashboard.
landing_section_brazil_description: Deposit into local bank accounts with confirmation and transfer traceability.
landing_section_peru_title: Reliable payments for family and business
landing_section_peru_description: Operate with clear conversion and real-time tracking from your dashboard.
landing_testimonial_1_quote: I use it every month for my family in Lima. It's clear, fast, and never surprises me.
landing_testimonial_2_quote: The calculator saves me time because I can see exactly how much they'll receive before sending.
landing_testimonial_3_quote: Support really responds. They helped me through the full process from my first transfer.
landing_faq_1_question: How long does a transfer take?
landing_faq_1_answer: It depends on the receiving bank, but most operations are confirmed within minutes.
landing_faq_2_answer: You can currently operate with PEN, BRL, and USD depending on the available transfer flow.
landing_faq_3_question: Can I review my transfer history?
landing_faq_3_answer: Yes. Once inside your dashboard, you can see status, amounts, and details for each operation.
landing_faq_4_answer: No. Before confirming, we always show commission and applied exchange rate.
landing_section_cta_description: Create your account and move money with a platform built for people operating between Brazil and Peru.
